DOC.brief_title: Dose Escalation Study JNJ-63709178 , Humanized CD123 x CD3 DuoBody Subjects With Relapsed Refractory Acute Myeloid Leukemia ( AML )
DOC.detailed_description: This first-in-human ( FIH ) Phase 1 , open-label ( identity assign study drug know ) , multicenter , dose escalation study dose expansion identify RP2D evaluate safety , tolerability , preliminary antitumor activity JNJ-63709178 adult subject relapse refractory acute myeloid leukemia ( AML ) ineligible exhaust standard therapeutic option . The study divide 3 period : Screening Phase ( 28 day first dose study drug ) , Treatment Phase ( first dose study drug last dose study drug ) Post-treatment Follow-up Phase ( end study participation end study ) . Subjects ' safety monitor throughout study .
DOC.criteria: A diagnosis acute myeloid leukemia ( AML ) accord World Health Organization 2008 criterion relapse refractory disease ineligible exhausted standard therapeutic option . Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status score 0 1 Hematology laboratory parameter within Protocol specify range Chemistry laboratory parameter within Protocol specify range A woman childbearing potential must negative highly sensitive serum ( beta human chorionic gonadotropin [ bhCG ] ) urine test prior first dose study drug Acute promyelocytic leukemia Active central nervous system involvement Prior solid organ transplantation Prior hematopoietic stem cell transplant within 6 month enrollment . If subject allogenic transplant must apparent sign graft versus host disease subject must immunosuppressive therapy Prior treatment CD123xCD3 bispecific agent , T cell express CD123 specific chimeric antigen receptor , toxinconjugated CD123 antibody ; prior treatment naked antiCD123 monoclonal antibody permit
